code: import axios from'axios';import*as actionTypes from'../actions/actionTypes';var addAllUsers=function addAllUsers(data){return{type:actionTypes.GET_ALL_USERS,data:data};};export var getAllUsers=function getAllUsers(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("users.json").then(function(response){dispatch(addAllUsers(response.data));}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};};
